channel.title: Comments on: Irish man on stage for Apple Developer Conference

item.title: By: Benjamin Mosse
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Mosse
item.description:
Thanks for the kind words, Fergus. Last week was great ... we even bagged an Apple Design Award. I'm told it still counts even though it was a runner-up award.
Also, to put the record straight, I'm not a VP at AP ... I work with them as Director of Mobile Products. See you in New York soon?
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the kind words, Fergus. Last week was great … we even bagged an Apple Design Award. I’m told it still counts even though it was a runner-up award.

Also, to put the record straight, I’m not a VP at AP … I work with them as Director of Mobile Products. See you in New York soon?

item.title: By: Gerard Hartnett
item.dc:creator: Gerard Hartnett
item.description: We've just started coding a coClarity client for the iPhone. Very early stages, so if anyone out there has some Objective-C experience and a hankering to change the world, please let us know.
item.content:encoded: We’ve just started coding a coClarity client for the iPhone. Very early stages, so if anyone out there has some Objective-C experience and a hankering to change the world, please let us know.
